00105 double CSurf::block(int x, int y, int h, int w,IplImage *I)
00106 {
00107         int pix_size = 4;//(I->depth & 255) >> 3;
00108         uchar* ptr = (uchar*)I->imageData;
00109         long int * ptr1,*ptr2,*ptr3,*ptr4;
00110        
00111         ptr1 = ( long int*)(ptr +  y*I->widthStep + x*pix_size);
00112         ptr2 = ( long int*)(ptr +  (y+h)*I->widthStep + (x+w)*pix_size);
00113         ptr3 = ( long int*)(ptr +  y*I->widthStep + (x+w)*pix_size);
00114         ptr4 = ( long int*)(ptr +  (y+h)*I->widthStep + x*pix_size);
00115     
00116     //return cvGet2D(I,y,x).val[0]+cvGet2D( I,y+h, x+w).val[0]- cvGet2D(I,y,x+w).val[0]- cvGet2D( I,y+h, x).val[0];
00117         return *ptr1+*ptr2-*ptr3-*ptr4;

00132 float CSurf::orientation(int x, int y, int s)
00133 {
00134        //IplImage* circle;
00135        //circle=cvCreateImage(cvSize(6*s,6*s),IPL_DEPTH_8U,1);
00136        //cvGetRectSubPix( img, circle, cvPoint2D32f(x,y) ); 
00137        int hor[36];
00138        int ver[36];
00139        float angle[36];
00140        float orient=0;
00141        float mod=0;
00142        float old_mod=0;
00143        // cout<<"point" <<x<<" "<<y<<" "<<s<<endl;
00144        int k=0;
00145        for (int i=-3*s; i<3*s; i+=s)
00146          for (int j=-3*s; j<3*s; j+=s)
00147          {   
00148               hor[k]=(int)wl_horz(i+x,j+y,s);
00149               ver[k]=(int)wl_vert(i+x,j+y,s);
00150               angle[k]=atan2(ver[k],hor[k]);
00151               k++;
00152          }
00153        
00154        float pitercios = 3.14159/3.0;
00155        float dospi=3.14159*2.0;
00156        float sumx,sumy;
00157        for (float i=0; i<dospi;i+=0.1)
00158        {
00159            //cout<<"angle "<<i<<endl;
00160            sumx=0;
00161            sumy=0;
00162            for (int j=0; j<36;j++)
00163            {
00164                if (((angle[j]<i+pitercios)&&(angle[j]>i))||
00165                (((angle[j]+dospi)<i+pitercios)&&((angle[j]+dospi)>i)))
00166                {
00167                    sumx+=hor[j];
00168                    sumy+=ver[j];
00169                }
00170            }
00171          
00172            mod=sumx*sumx+sumy*sumy;
00173            if (mod>old_mod)
00174            {
00175               old_mod= mod;
00176               orient=i;
00177            }
00178        }
00179        
00180        return orient;
00181 }

00183 double CSurf::wl_vert(int x, int y,int s)
00184 {
00185     //   cout<<"vert "<<x<<" "<<y<<" "<<s<<endl;

00187      //   if ((x-2*s>0)&&(y-2*s>0)&&(x+2*s<integral->width)&&(y+2*s<integral->height))
00188      //  {
00189        r=1*block(x-2*s,y+2*s,2*s,4*s,integral);
00190        r=r-1*block(x-2*s,y,2*s,4*s,integral);
00191      //  }else r=0;
00192        return r;
00193 }

00195 double CSurf::wl_horz(int x, int y,int s)

00201        r=1*block(x-2*s,y+2*s,4*s,2*s,integral);
00202        r=r-1*block(x,y+2*s,4*s,2*s,integral);
00203       // }else r=0;
00204        return r;

00342 float CSurf::horiz(int x, int y,int s, IplImage* region)
00343 {
00344 //     IplImage* kernel;
00345 //     kernel=cvCreateImage(cvSize(2*s,2*s),8,1);
00346      int *kernel = new int [2*s*2*s];
00347      float sum=0; 
00348      for (int i=0; i<2*s; i++){
00349         for (int j=0; j<s;j++)
00350           {
00351                 kernel[i*2*s+j]=-1;
00352           }
00353         for (int j=s; j<2*s;j++)
00354           {
00355                 kernel[i*2*s+j]=1;
00356           }
00357      }
00358      for (int i=0; i<2*s; i++)
00359         for (int j=0; j<2*s;j++){
00360         {
00361             if ((x+i<region->width)&&(y+j<region->height))
00362                 sum+=cvGetReal2D(region, x+i,y+j)*kernel[i*2*s+j];
00363         }
00364      } 
00365         delete(kernel);
00366 //     cvReleaseImage(&kernel);
00367      return sum ;
00368 }
00369 float CSurf::vert(int x, int y, int s, IplImage* region)
00370 {
00371      //IplImage* kernel;
00372      //kernel=cvCreateImage(cvSize(2*s,2*s),8,1);
00373      int *kernel=new int [2*s*2*s];
00374      float sum=0; 
00375      for (int j=0; j<2*s; j++){
00376         for (int i=0; i<s;i++)
00377           {
00378                 kernel[i*2*s+j]=-1;
00379           }
00380         for (int i=s; i<2*s;i++)
00381           {
00382                 kernel[i*2*s+j]=1;
00383           }
00384      }
00385      
00386      for (int i=0; i<2*s; i++){
00387         for (int j=0; j<2*s;j++)
00388         {
00389                 if ((x+i<region->width)&&(y+j<region->height))
00390                         sum+=cvGetReal2D(region, x+i,y+j)*kernel[i*2*s+j];
00391         }
00392      }
00393 //     cvReleaseImage(&kernel);
00394         delete (kernel); 
00395      return sum ;
00396 }
00405 int CSurf::nearest_neighbor_classify(int *query, int *example_pairs,int n_examples) 
00406 {
00407 
00408 // PUT YOUR NEAREST NEIGHBOR CLASSIFIER HERE, ASSIGN CLASS LABEL TO query_point[0]
00409   float suma = 0;
00410   float suma_min = 10000000;
00411   float suma_sec = 10000000;
00412   float dif;
00413   unsigned int nearest_neighbour = 0;
00414 //para cada muestra
00415   for (unsigned int i = 0; i<n_examples; i++)
00416   {
00417     suma = 0;
00418         //para cada componente
00419     for (unsigned int j = 0; j<64;j++)
00420     {
00421 //distancia en norma2
00422             dif=example_pairs[i*64+j]-query[j];
00423         suma += dif*dif;
00424         //printf("ex_pairs %d query %d\n",example_pairs[i*64+j],query[j]);
00425     }
00426     suma=sqrt(suma);
00427     if (suma < suma_min)
00428     {
00429       suma_sec = suma_min;
00430       suma_min = suma;
00431       nearest_neighbour = i;
00432     }else if (suma < suma_sec)
00433     {  
00434       suma_sec = suma;
00435     }
00436   }
00437     cout<<" suma_min: "<<suma_min<<" nearest_neighbour "<<nearest_neighbour<<" suma_sec "<<suma_sec<<" ratio "<<suma_min/suma_sec<<endl;
00438     for (int j=0; j<64 ; j++)
00439         cout<<example_pairs[nearest_neighbour*64+j]<<" : "<<query[j]<<endl;
00440     //query->data[0] = example_pairs[nearest_neighbour].data[0];
00443         if ((suma_min <150000)&&((suma_min/suma_sec)<0.9)){
00444                 return nearest_neighbour;
00445         }else {
00446                 return -1;
00447         }
00448         
00449 }

00477             // cout<<"aceptado "<< sqrt (dx*dx+dy*dy)<< endl;

00485         }

00488         {
00489           suma_sec = suma_min;
00490           suma_min = suma;
00491           nearest_neighbour = i;
00492         }else if (suma < suma_sec)

00494           suma_sec = suma;
00495         }
00496     }

00577             c=dxy[j*(img->width+1)+i];//cvGetReal2D(dyy,j,i);
00578 //            cvSet2D(det[level],j+(int)(4.5*s+0.5),i+(int)(4.5*s+0.5),cvScalar((a*b-0.9*cvGetReal2D(dxy,j,i))/65000.0));//*cvGet2D(dxx,j,i).val[0]
00579             det[level*img->width*img->height+(j+(int)(4.5*s+0.5))*img->width+i+(int)(4.5*s+0.5)]=
00580                               (a*b-(0.9*c*0.9*c))/(65000.0);
00581            
00582         }
00583         
00584       /*   cvShowImage("win",dyy);
00585          cvWaitKey(100);
00586          cvShowImage("win",dxx);
00587          cvWaitKey(100);
00588          cvShowImage("win",dxy);
00589          cvWaitKey(100);*/
00590 //         cvShowImage("win",det[level]);
00591 //         cvWaitKey(100);
00592    }//end levels
00593     non_max_sup(det,max,feat,levels);
00594     delete(dxx);//cvReleaseImage(&dxx);
00595     delete(dyy);//cvReleaseImage(&dyy);
00596     delete(dxy);//cvReleaseImage(&dxy);
00597     delete(det);
00598    /* for(int level=0;level<levels;level++){
00599        cvReleaseImage(&(max[level]));
00600     }*/
00601 }
00602 void CSurf::gaussian(IplImage* img)
00603 {
00604 int w = img->width;
00605 int h = img->height;
00606 float x,y;
00607 float c; 
00608 c=w/2;
00609 for (int i =0; i<w; i++)
00610     for (int j=0; j<h;j++)
00611       {
00612              x=i-w/2.;
00613              y=j-h/2.;          
00614              cvSetReal2D(img, j,i, exp(-(x*x+y*y)/(2*c*c)));
00615       }    
00616 }
